details.title: Nonlinear VSC technique for power system Integrate Controllers
details.abstract: This paper studies the nonlinear control (VSC) structure control (VSC) technique for designing power system integrate control systems which include an excitation controller and fast valve controller. A new method is applied to find nonlinear switching surface in deriving the control strategy. The responses to various large perturbation are simulated. The simulation results show that the nonlinear VSC technique for integrated control systems can considerably improve the transient stabilization limitation of power systems and improve the dynamic properties of the generators.
